```{r fig.width=7, fig.height=6.92, dpi = 72}
library(radiant)
library(stargazer)

result <- regress(dataset = "diamonds", rvar = "price", evar = c( "depth"))
summary(result, sum_check = "confint", test_var = c("clarity", "color"))
```


```{r fig.width=7, fig.height=6.92, dpi = 72}
library(broom)
library(knitr)
result2 <- lm( price~depth, data = diamonds)
# summary.lm(result2, signif.stars = TRUE) 
tidy(result2, conf.int = TRUE) 
```
```{r}
library(lmtest)
library(zoo)
library(sandwich)
ct = coeftest(result2, vcovHC(result2, type = "HC1"))
tidy(ct)
```

```{r}
round(t(glance(result2)),3) %>% kable(col.names = c("Value"))

```

```{r}
result <- regress(dataset = "diamonds", rvar = "carat", evar = c("cut", "color", "depth"), check = c("robust", "standardize"))
```
